auction_site.description: The name of the auction site.

auction_buyer_id.description: The ID of the buyer who makes the purchase in the auction. This ID might be different from the payer ID provided for the payment.

auction_closing_date.description: The date and time when the auction closes, in [Internet date and time format](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6).
